# Comparison with @magnetic/core/Label

| Props            | MDS  | CDS  |
| ---------------- | ---- | ---- |
| disabled         |      | ✅   |
| infoMessage      |      | ✅\* |
| optional         | ✅   | ✅   |
| required         | ✅   | ✅   |
| size             | ✅   | ✅   |
| tooltip          | ✅\* |      |
| tooltipPlacement |      | ✅   |

> 1 - The `tooltip` prop changed to `infoMessage`.
> 2 - If both `optional` and `required` prop is true then `required` prop takes precedence.
